text: Καί, ταῦτα γράφομεν ὑμῖνυμιν f35 C [98.8%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ ημεις ℵAvB [1.2%] NU ἵνα ἡ χαρὰ ἡμῶνημων f35 ℵB [59%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP,NU ¦ υμων A,C [41%] (Some TRs read ‘your’. Either pronoun makes sense, and the difference is in only one letter, but ‘our’ has the better attestation, as well as making better sense.) ᾖ πεπληρωμένη.
